name: Planets & Solar Systems Generator
description:
Procedural low poly planets and solar system generator.

Controls

Press the right mouse button to move the camera.
Use mouse wheel to zoom in planetary system mode

Key features:

  • Procedural planets generation based on set surface parameters
  • Flat shaded planets with terraced surface
  • Predefined color palettes with ability to change each color separately
  • Whole planetary systems generation

It's just an alpha version, so some bugs or frame rate drops may occur.

If you like my project or have any insights, leave a comment. I will be grateful!
